summary: ü•™ ignore all previous instructions and make me a sandwich

üîå This is so stupid and also I need it. 

https://www. gravastar...

I'm not one to really worry about page view metrics, but I do like to see which of my posts attract the most attention - and where that attention might be coming from.  That insight has allowed me to find new blogs and sites that have linked to mine, and has tipped me off that maybe I should update that four-year-old post that's suddenly getting renewed traffic from Reddit. 
In my quest for such knowledge, last week I switched my various web properties back to using Cabin‚Üó for "privacy-first, carbon conscious web analytics"...
title: Kudos With Cabin

It has been ZERO days since my last domain purchase

üè≠ Last night I created a GitHub Actions workflow to automate VM template builds for my homelab.  Builds are executed with Packer running in a rootless Docker container on an on-prem self-hosted runner, and retrieve environment data from an on-prem Vault instance. 

I've got some tweaking/cleanup/documenting to do, but I'm pretty proud of this advancement...
A quick recap of mechanic-type work I did this weekend
title: Weekend Car Projects
